text: Jonas Krumrey (born 25 November 2003) is a German professional footballer. He plays as a goalkeeper for Second league club Liefering. ==Career == His career began with TSV 1860 Rosenheim and FC Bayern MÃ¼nchen. In 2017 he went on to the Red Bull Salzburg Academy. Then he became 3rd goalkeeper of FC Liefering behind Daniel Antosch and Adam Stejskal. In the 2021-22 season he is the 2nd goalkeeper of Liefering. His debut for FC Liefering was on August 13, 2021. He played versus SKU AmstettenFC Salzburg Wikias part of the Starting XI. In January 2023 he moved into Salzburg's Bundesliga squad. On June 14, 2023, he extended his contract there until 2027. In August 2024 he was loaned to Lyngby BK in Denmark.
